Html: I don't know if this is a bug or just bad data but I get an error in albumpicker when editing the test news item with id 1.
Which version? I had to fix a lot of bugs in the photo/album stuff in v2. Those discussions should be easy to find. I posted some of the fixes.

Version 3 rc1

The database has an image table and an images table and I am not sure if the albumids and image ids match correctly.

v3 beta 1, you mean?

I know... the album picker is a mess. I will eventually clean it up before v3 in final.
